data.name: Bashville
data.detailed_description:
Version 2.0!

Major feature update for Bashville! Local 2-Players has been added! Now you can dive through The Realm with a partner! Support each other and cause double the mayhem! Coins and XP gain has also been increased so that you can level up faster, and unlock weapons and upgrade them quicker as well.

There are new mobs, a new boss, and new levels/maps that have destructible obstacles. Apart from satisfaction from destroying the obstacles, they randomly drop Coins as well!

Updates found in this release:

    • Local 2-Players
    • New levels
    • New mobs
    • New boss
    • Less repeat of level/maps
    • Close/exit game from main screen
    • Enter & Esc keys supported in message dialogs
    • Destructible obstacles in levels; randomly drop Coins when destroyed
    • Higher value Coins dropped
    • Higher XP gain
    • Bug fixes


Coming Updates

2-Players

The next big update for Bashvile is... 2 players! That is, local cooperative 2-players, just like the good ol' arcade games of the glory days! This is currently under development, so do look out for an estimated release date soon.


About the Game

The Realm of your world has been invaded by mobs of unknown origin. Alien portals have appeared throughout The Realm allowing these mobs to travel through unchecked. It is up to you to descend in through to the deepest levels of The Realm to destroy these mobs and stop the alien invasion!

Bashville is a good old-fashioned shoot 'em up with loads of weapons and enemies to fight. Go through The Realm levels and defeat the various enemies found within. Use the level environment to your advantage. However, be careful of the bosses as they have some really dangerous weapons!

A classical type of walk-around shooter in isometric view, Bashville also includes first-person and bird's eye views. It supports two keyboard configurations, mouse support, and game controller support. The playable characters have their own stats advantages and disadvantages. That, along with the various weapons available, there is something for everyone to pick a combination that suits your play style.

Here are the main features:
• Single-player walk-around shoot ‘em up
• 5 playable characters
• Each playable character has its own stats potential of maximum HP and Speed
• A wide variety of weapons each with its strengths and weaknesses
• Each weapon has encumbrance which affects the speed of the characters
• A set of pre-defined level/maps
• 99 Realm levels of generated mobs to be completed
• Gain Experience Points from defeating mobs and bosses to level up to increase HP and Speed
• Destroy mobs and collect Coins which can be used to unlock weapons and upgrade them [*NOTE: weapons upgrade not available in Demo]
• Multiple boss battles
• Multiple game views:
    • Isometric
    • First-person
    • Bird’s eye/top-down
• Multiple controls:
    • Keyboard
      • Tank-style controls
      • 8-direction controls
    • Mouse [in combination with keyboard]
    • Game controller

data.short_description: Bashville is a good old-fashioned shoot 'em up with loads of weapons and enemies to fight. Go through The Realm levels and defeat the various enemies found within. Use the level environment to your advantage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or NVidia card with 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: El Capitan (10.11.x)
  • Processor: Intel i5, 2.26GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or NVidia card w/ 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
